Form

author: github: Form 版本: 1.0.0描述: uxcore-form ui component for react
  • tag: uxcore, form
  • description: 让form代码变的简单，可配
  • maintainers: 骁勇
  • version: 1.0.0
  • lastupdate: 7/5/2015
  • screenshots: example/screenshot.png

TL;DR

Feature List/特性

Usage 最佳实践 demo

$ git clone https://github.com/uxcore/uxcore-form
$ cd uxcore-form
$ npm install
$ npm run dev

Apply scope

  • uxcore-form, including form common validation, layout etc

API

  • Attr

    • jsxdata
    • jsxmode
    • jsxprefixCls
